name: Playback Config API Reference
description:
Reference for the Brightcove Playback Config API, used to specify which existing delivery rules and behaviors need to be applied. This API allows you to get, add, update and delete behaviors for an account.

Notes:
  • Policy keys are generated automatically for Brightcove Players.
  • To test API requests, you can use our API Testing Tools
title: Playback Config API Reference
